TopicTitle: James Orbit and James air planes and space craft

Articles.Content:
Welcome to James Orbit

jamesorbit.webs.com

James Orbit started in early 2012, when James Air (The main company) decided it needed to extend. First, James Rail came. Then some other boring stuff. Last of all, The James Orbit Space Team was created.

J.O.S.T Was set up to allow James Air to reach new heights. Not only do they control all of the James Air space missions, but also carry out most of the research needed to run James Air.

Our goal is to bring affordable space travel to all kerbals that don\'t want to be killed!

We pride our selfs in being one of the most reliable Space organizations in the world. We never launch until we know it is safe (Well, maybe not always, but we try our best! ;D ).

Edited September 1, 2012 by jamieadd

Ultra-tech X joined forces with James air and James orbit to Make a selection of planes.

UTX-540:

Top speed: Mach 2.204

Range: Short

Max Height: 25000 meters

Max crew: 1

suggested uses:

military: defense, Navy

Civilian: shows, short flights, showing off

The James Orbit x-25 space plane:

Our fist successful launch, orbit and return.

We currently are looking for a high altitude plane to carry our craft up to its launch altitude.

LKO: RVL, a 100% reusable space craft (requires KW-SLR wildcat V, mk2 bi-coupler & mechjeb) [ATTACH]32206[/ATTACH]

Edited September 1, 2012 by jamieadd

Projects:

Expedition:

James Orbits New Mission is called Expedition. This is because we plan to find and explore new places all over the kerbalverse.

To do this, J.O.S.T Made plans for a new spacecraft.

During tests we took some pictures:

James Air:

Visit jamesairgroup.webs.com

James Orbit:

Newton:

Newton is a set of small space labs/stations set up to allow cheap stays in space.

Newton 7 was set up to allow scientists to conduct experiments in micro gravity.

Newton 11 is identical to Newton 7, but is intended as more of a tourist hotel.

Britannia 2:

Britannia 2 is a very small reusable craft that can take 1 person into a Low Kerbin Orbit. in extreme cases Britannia craft can land on the mun with half a tank to spare once its returned.
